data.message: Hey There!!! Facebook Administrators, I am seriously reporting there was a troublesomely bad situation related to yesterdays big FB outage that caused my account to be temporally inoperable for a couple of hours. Anyway Facebook Administrators, "PLEASE" can U sincerely address all of those specific things that are fully mentioned Today{September.25,2015) concerning yesterdays problem. Lastly Facebook Administrators, I urgently need plenty of help{SOS etc.) fully regarding yesterdays FB outage dilemma.
